unnormalised: Lights, Camera, Festival! The Entertainment world is buzzing with film festival season in full swing! From Cannes red carpets to the quaint auditoriums of Kerala, cinephiles are getting their fix. Word on the street is that the Jio MAMI Mumbai Film Festival is gearing up for a spectacular edition later this year.
normalised: Lights, Camera, Festival! The Entertainment world is buzzing with film festival season in full swing! From Cannes red carpets to the quaint auditoriums of Kerala, cinephiles are getting their fix. Word on the street is that the J-i-o M-A-M-I Mumbai Film Festival is gearing up for a spectacular edition later this year.

unnormalised: But it's not just the big names; smaller, regional festivals are also shining bright. Take, for instance, the Pondicherry International Film Festival, showcasing indie gems and celebrating local talent.
normalised: But it's not just the big names; smaller, regional festivals are also shining bright. Take, for instance, the Pondicherry International Film Festival, showcasing indie gems and celebrating local talent.

unnormalised: Speaking of local, after a day of back-to-back screenings, nothing beats some delicious Hyderabadi biryani, right? Perfect festival fuel!
normalised: Speaking of local, after a day of back-to-back screenings, nothing beats some delicious Hyderabadi biryani, right? Perfect festival fuel!

unnormalised: Did you know that films exploring themes around Onam are especially popular this time of year? The Chennai International Film Festival always has a dedicated section, apparently.
normalised: Did you know that films exploring themes around Onam are especially popular this time of year? The Chennai International Film Festival always has a dedicated section, apparently.

unnormalised: Anyways, whether it's catching a Bollywood blockbuster or an experimental documentary, film festivals offer a unique opportunity to immerse yourself in storytelling. So, grab your popcorn (or should we say, your masala peanuts?) and get ready for some cinematic adventures! Looks like the next few months are going to be quite the show. Don't miss out!
normalised: Anyways, whether it's catching a Bollywood blockbuster or an experimental documentary, film festivals offer a unique opportunity to immerse yourself in storytelling. So, grab your popcorn (or should we say, your masala peanuts?) and get ready for some cinematic adventures! Looks like the next few months are going to be quite the show. Don't miss out!
